Tree Blight.description:
枯萎怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.oIXTiU1B2cJqnVtP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

枯树怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.D5No4Ue9PCh5HOJj caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmBranch00000000]] 攻击并使用一次[[/item .mmGraspingRoot00]]。

Grasping Root.name: 根系缠绕
Grasping Root.description:
力量豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]] 尺[[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的不超过大型的生物。

失败：目标被[[lookup @name lowercase]] 拉近至多 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]] 尺，并被其六条树根之一缠绕，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。目标在其回合开始时受到 [[/damage average]]伤害，直至擒抱结束。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 你被枯树怪六条树根之一缠绕，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 16，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。

Gnash.name: 朽躯啮咬
Gnash.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CNoawEWxNhs5HRIk]]，单一受擒于[[lookup @name lowercase]]的生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

Stench.name: 恶臭
Stench.description:
体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]，在源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]] 尺光环区域内开始其回合的所有非[[lookup @name lowercase]]生物。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至其下个回合开始。

成功： 目标在 1 小时内免疫所有[[lookup @name lowercase]]的恶臭。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至下一回合开始。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Loathsome Limbs.name: 扰人断肢
Loathsome Limbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l's limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

Exhaustion 1.name: 1 级力竭
Exhaustion 1.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Exhaustion 2.name: 2 级力竭
Exhaustion 2.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Exhaustion 3.name: 3 级力竭
Exhaustion 3.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Exhaustion 4.name: 4 级力竭
Exhaustion 4.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Exhaustion 5.name: 5 级力竭
Exhaustion 5.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Exhaustion Dead.name: 力竭而亡
Exhaustion Dead.description: 你每有一条失去的肢体，获得 1 级&Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]。

Regeneration.name: 再生
Regeneration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 至少拥有 1 点生命值，则其在自己的回合开始时恢复 [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] 点生命值。

heal.condition: 在其回合开始时，至少拥有 1 点生命值

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Charge.name: 冲锋
Charge.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 向一名其可见的敌人直线移动至多等于其速度一半的距离。

Twig Blight.name: 枯枝怪
Twig Blight.description:
枯萎怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.oIXTiU1B2cJqnVtP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

枯枝怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.4iHm8iktmxV4hyP0 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] 攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。受擒期间，目标还会陷入束缚状态且不能成为 &Reference[Restrained apply=falsse] 状态且不能成为[[lookup @name lowcase]]尾击的目标。

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: 若你的生物体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 17，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。受擒期间，你还会陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态。

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若目标生物体型不超过巨型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的生物体型不超过巨型，则你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Umber Hulk.name: 掘土巨怪
Umber Hulk.description:
掘土巨怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.j9CGMjwt5JemDGYA caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Tunneler.name: 掘道者
Tunneler.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 能够以其一半的掘穴速度掘穴通过坚硬的岩石，并在其身后留下直径 10 尺的地道。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动三次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Confusing Gaze.name: 困惑凝视
Confusing Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target can’t take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a random creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

Unicorn.name: 独角兽
Unicorn.description:
独角兽

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.4EtOTIaHnhnS9jA5 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

独角兽巢穴

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.sTeJ3Fyus2oyLaRk caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmHooves00000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmRadiantHorn000]] 攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需法术成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectEvil], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]

每项1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCalmEmotio]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPasswithou]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWordofReca]

Detect Evil and Good.name: 侦测善恶
Detect Evil and Good.description:
在法术持续时间内，你定位距你 30 尺内任何异怪、天族、元素、妖精、邪魔、亡灵。你也可以感知到范围内是否具有激活的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHallow0000] 并确定其位置。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Druidcraft.name: 德鲁伊伎俩
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Calm Emotions.name: 安定心神
Calm Emotions.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，以该点为源点半径 20 尺球状区域内的每个类人生物必须成功通过一次魅力豁免，否则将受下列效应之一影响（由你分别为每名生物选择生效的效应）。

  • 直至法术结束，该生物免疫&Reference[Charmed apply=false]{魅惑}和&Reference[Frightened apply=false]{恐慌}状态。如果生物已经被魅惑或恐惧，这些状态在法术持续时间内被抑制。
  • 该生物对你选择的之前&Reference[Hostile apply=false]{敌对}的生物态度变为&Reference[Indifferent apply=false]{冷漠} 。该冷漠态度持续到目标受到伤害或者看到自己的盟友受到伤害。当法术结束时，该生物恢复到原本的态度。

Calmed.name: 冷静
Calmed.description: 直到法术结束，该生物免疫魅惑和恐慌状态。如果该生物已经陷入魅惑或恐慌状态，则这些状态在持续时间内被压制。

Indifference.name: 冷漠
Indifference.description: 该生物对你选择的之前敌对的生物态度变为冷漠。该冷漠态度持续到目标受到伤害或者看到自己的盟友受到伤害。当法术结束时，该生物恢复到原本的态度。

Dispel Evil and Good.name: 驱逐善恶
Dispel Evil and Good.description:
法术持续时间内，天族、元素、妖精、邪魔和亡灵对你的攻击检定具有劣势。你可以使用下述特殊功能之一以提前结束法术。

破咒。 以一个魔法动作，你触碰一名因上述生物类型的任意生物而被其附身、陷入 &Reference[Charmed] 或 &Reference[Frightened] 状态的生物。目标不再被上述生物附身，魅惑或恐慌。

驱离。 以一个魔法动作，你选择距你 5 尺内的一名可见生物，其生物类型必须是上述生物类型之一。目标必须成功于一次魅力豁免，否则，若其并未处于家园位面，则被遣送回其家园位面。对于亡灵和妖精，若它们并未处于家园位面，则亡灵会被遣送回堕影冥界，妖精则被遣送回妖精荒野。

affects.special: 天族、元素、精类、邪魔或亡灵
天族、元素、精类、邪魔或亡灵

Dispelling Evil and Good.name: 驱逐善恶
Dispelling Evil and Good.description: 法术持续时间内，天族、元素、妖精、邪魔和亡灵对你的攻击检定具有劣势。你可以使用下述特殊功能之一以提前结束法术：破咒 或 驱离。

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
缠绕的植物在施法距离内从 20 尺方状区域地面中破土而出。在法术持续时间内，这片被植物覆盖的区域变为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}。法术结束时，这些植物会消失。

在你施展法术时，该区域内的生物（除你之外）必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]{束缚}状态，直到法术终止。一名因此被束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定对抗该法术的豁免 DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 陷入束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定对抗该法术的豁免DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Pass without Trace.name: 行动无踪
Pass without Trace.description: 你在法术持续时间于 30 尺光环范围内散发出遮蔽灵光。位于灵光范围期间，你和每名你选择的生物在敏捷（[[/check ability=dex skill=ste]]{隐匿}）检定上获得 +10 加值，且不会留下任何踪迹。

Concealed.name: 隐蔽
Concealed.description: 你和每名被施法者选择的生物在[[/check ability=dex skill=ste]]检定上获得 +10 加值，且不会留下任何踪迹。

Word of Recall.name: 回返真言
Word of Recall.description:
你和你身边 5 尺内的至多五个自愿生物一起瞬间传送到一个你事先设置好的圣殿。你和与你一起传送的生物将出现在你准备圣殿时指定的地点（见下）旁边最近的未被占据位置。如果你在施放法术前没有事先准备好圣殿，则该法术将不产生任何效应。

你必须指定一个例如一座寺庙的地方，作为圣殿，在那里施放法术。

affects.special: 你和你身边 5 尺内的至多五名自愿生物

Charging Horn.name: 冲锋角击
Charging Horn.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]移动至多等于其速度一半的距离且不会引发 &Reference[Opportunity Attacks]，并发动一次[[/item Radiant Horn]]攻击。

Shimmering Shield.name: 闪光护盾
Shimmering Shield.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 以自身或其 [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] 尺范围内一个其可见的生物为目标。目标获得 [[/healing average temp]]，并且AC +2，直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合结束。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下个回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Shielded.name: 庇护
Shielded.description: 你的AC +2，持续至独角兽的下一回合结束。

Unicorn's Blessing.name: 独角兽祝福
Unicorn's Blessing.description: [[lookup @name lowcase]] 使用其角触碰另一生物并施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds] 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]，使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于 2d8 + 你施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d8 点。

Lesser Restoration.name: 次级复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Valindra Shadowmantle.name: Valindra Shadowmantle
Valindra Shadowmantle.description:
Cold and Calculating Lich Wizard

Valindra Shadowmantle was a selfish and ambitious high elf wizard who eschewed her community in search of arcane power in the wider world. Valindra has no compunctions about forming allies of convenience, and she’s worked with Szass Tam and his Red Wizards of Thay, the Arcane Brotherhood of Luskan, devil cultists, and more.

Although Valindra has the sunken pallor common to liches, she prefers to maintain a magical disguise that allows her to appear as the high elf she was in life. Ever the schemer, Valindra doesn’t use this disguise out of nostalgia or regret, but to hide the powers she has since gained as an Undead creature.

Learn More about Valindra

Valindra is featured in The Fallbacks: Bound for Ruin novel and the Tomb of Annihilation adventure. You can learn more about her origins in The Pirate King (part of the Legend of Drizzt series).

History

Whether Valindra chose to leave the high elf community in which she was raised or whether she was cast out for cruelty is unclear. In either case, Valindra traveled the Sword Coast and the North, apprenticing herself to whichever wizards might impart knowledge to an eager and flattering pupil.

Valindra took her skills to the Arcane Brotherhood in Luskan, where she earned the special attention of its head, Arklem Greeth. Arklem and Valindra were close; when they were slain, they arose as liches together with gems to house their souls.

Valindra has since left Arklem and the Arcane Brotherhood to serve as a knowledgeable operative for cults, secret societies, and criminal enterprises. Valindra provides her services only for a carefully considered price, whether arcane secrets, powerful magic items, or favors.

Personality

Valindra likes to present as a pleasant, overcurious scholar. She prefers to leverage her intellect over raw might and enjoys victories earned through outmaneuvering her foes rather than brute arcane might. If she can twist her enemies into fighting each other or stumbling into unwinnable ambushes, she never has to reveal the true extent of her abilities. Valindra sometimes makes the calculated decision to face destruction rather than reveal the extent of her secrets, confident that her soul gem can revive her.

Valindra maintains cordial relations with the many evil organizations she’s served to better leverage their aid in the future. She betrays an allied group only when she needs to eliminate witnesses who might paint her as untrustworthy. Many sinister groups overlook rumors of disloyalty for a chance to leverage her overwhelming arcane power.

Valindra Shadowmantle’s Lair

Valindra lairs within a sprawling, ruined library in the Shadowfell. After several disastrous confrontations with enemies of her temporary allies, she’s elected to keep her personal lair secret. Deep within her lair is a hidden reading room where she usually keeps her spirit gem.

The region containing Valindra’s lair is warped by her presence, creating the following effects:

All-Seeing. While in her lair, Valindra can cast Clairvoyance, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as her Spellcasting action.

Apathy. Creatures within 1 mile of the lair that aren’t Undead have Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws and Initiative rolls.

Thirst for Knowledge. Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures have Advantage on Intelligence checks made when they take the Study action.

If Valindra dies or moves her lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately. These effects resume if Valindra gains a new body (see her [[/item Spirit Gem]] trait).

Using Valindra Shadowmantle

As a powerful lich who doesn’t maintain any particular loyalties for very long, Valindra can serve as a surprise lieutenant or mastermind behind any sinister organization in your campaign. She might be investigating a powerful Artifact or leading an important ritual. Valindra frequently leverages her many prior connections, so her presence might bring different evil groups together in an uneasy alliance.

You might foreshadow Valindra’s presence by dropping hints that a martial organization like the Zhentarim has unexpected magical support, or having cultists refer to a capable elf “specialist” who is sharing her magical secrets.

Valindra hides her true nature behind an illusion of her mortal form. You can therefore keep her lich powers a surprise, especially if you want to have her return after being defeated.

Valindra’s lair can be the setting of her showdown against the characters, or it can be a hidden location the characters must quickly find to finish off Valindra for good.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
Valindra casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):

At Will: [[/item .qoCHfLG9WsbA2cFK]]{Detect Magic}, [[/item .4BDQXnp81mrlMwjS]]{Detect Thoughts}, [[/item .CwikjzpQ4p7dfjkl]]{Dispel Magic}, [[/item .huLjqK2V4iFPqD1W]]{Fly}, [[/item .gsl7qxgZSgI0R08K]]{Invisibility}, [[/item .APLdX8Ql1nvC5vlQ]]{Lightning Bolt} (level 5 version), [[/item .tLSVFghif3fkJEvr]]{Mage Hand}, [[/item .TrY65jrGqb9yqwVY]]{Prestidigitation}

2/Day Each: [[/item .KavOmnKmItzyVhZa]]{Animate Dead}, [[/item .45kgRRenq7bqA1Y0]]{Plane Shift}

1/Day Each: [[/item .D4Ee9qoO8GlRUZQW]]{Cone of Cold} (level 8 version), [[/item .xAEKCpFEelif6ylL]]{Finger of Death}, [[/item .9aqKyIlEvBdOGrlD]]{Power Word Kill}, [[/item .pb1lwkV3GERAU907]]{Scrying}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: Valindra makes three attacks, using [[/item Eldritch Burst]] or [[/item Paralyzing Touch]] in any combination. She can replace two attacks with a use of [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast [[/item .APLdX8Ql1nvC5vlQ]]{Lightning Bolt} (level 5 version).

Paralyzing Touch.name: 麻痹之触
Paralyzing Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the start of Valindra’s next turn.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: The target is &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] until the start of attacking creature's next turn.

Deathly Grasp.name: Deathly Grasp
Deathly Grasp.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=V7HV2U7gCiPgnXct]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=V7HV2U7gCiPgnXct]]-foot Emanation originating from Valindra.

First Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Subsequent Failures: [[/damage average activity=jT5vFVuvN9PfiatU]] damage, and Valindra gains [[/healing]].

Disrupt Life.name: 扰乱生命
Disrupt Life.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ItJIzm5lUgH3Wm1i]], each creature that isn’t Undead in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ItJIzm5lUgH3Wm1i]]-foot Emanation originating from Valindra.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Valindra can’t take this action again until the start of her next turn.

Eldritch Jaunt.name: Eldritch Jaunt
Eldritch Jaunt.description: Valindra makes one [[/item Eldritch Burst]] attack. Before or after the attack, Valindra can teleport up to 20 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

Life-Rending Gaze.name: Life-Rending Gaze
Life-Rending Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ONY0CCho7GkVwH5y]], one creature Valindra can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ONY0CCho7GkVwH5y]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Illusory Disguise.name: Illusory Disguise
Illusory Disguise.description: Valindra casts [[/item .IS4PdmpzwSIJrgoe]]{Disguise Self}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. The spell lasts until Valindra drops to 30 Hit Points or fewer or uses her [[/item Life-Rending Gaze]] Legendary Action. Intelligence (Investigation) checks made to discern her true appearance are made with Disadvantage.

Protective Magic.name: 护身魔法
Protective Magic.description: Valindra casts [[/item .xbWI1UVpsp8Vuzda]]{Counterspell} or [[/item .zqmrTrttsb143KcT]]{Shield} in response to the spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Component Pouch.name: 材料包
Component Pouch.description: 材料包是一种装有你法术所需的一切免费材料的防水小包。

Spirit Gem.name: Spirit Gem
Spirit Gem.description: If destroyed, Valindra re-forms in [[/r 1d10]] days if her spirit gem is intact, reviving with all her Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within her lair.

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Fly.name: 飞行术
Fly.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。目标在法术持续时间内获得 60 尺的飞行速度且可以悬浮。法术终止时，如果目标仍在空中则随即坠落，除非其能停止坠落。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Lightning Bolt.name: 闪电束
Lightning Bolt.description:
一束 100 尺长，5 尺宽的线状闪电从你的位置向你指定的任意方向爆发迸出。在线状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败者将受到 8d6 的闪电伤害，豁免成功则受到半数伤害。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比三环高一环，伤害就增加 1d6。

materials.value: 一些毛皮和一把水晶权杖

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Animate Dead.name: 活化死尸
Animate Dead.description:
在施法距离内指定一具中型或小型类人生物遗骨或遗体。目标将变为一名亡灵生物：遗骨变为@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobSkeleton00]{骷髅}，遗体则变为@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobZombie0000]{丧尸}。

在你的每个回合内，你可以使用一个附赠动作并以精神命令操纵距离你 60 尺内，任何你用此法术制造的生物（如果你操纵多个生物，则你的命令可以同时传达给它们全部或是其中的某几个，不过每次只能为它们下达同一命令）。你决定被操纵生物下回合执行的动作和如何移动。或者，你也可以选择下达一条宽泛的命令（比如守护某个房间或走廊）。如果你没有下达命令，该生物将执行回避动作且只会为躲避危险而移动。一旦被下达命令，该生物会持续执行命令直到任务完成。

这些受操纵生物只会在 24 小时内服从你的命令，在之后，它们会停止遵守你下达的命令。若你想将对这些生物的控制时间再延长 24 小时，则你必须在当前 24 小时的时间段终止前再次对这些生物施展该法术。法术的此种用法只能延长你对至多四个你使用此法术所创造生物的控制时间，而不会创造新的生物。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比三环高一环，你就能多唤起两只亡灵生物，或是多延长对两只亡灵生物的控制。你无法用同一具骸骨或遗体唤起多个亡灵生物。

materials.value: 一滴血，一块肉，以及一点骨灰

Plane Shift.name: 位面转移
Plane Shift.description:
你和至多八名手牵着手形成一个圆圈的生物被输送到一个不同的存在位面。你可以概括地指名一个目的地，比如火元素位面的黄铜之城或九层地狱第二层迪斯帕特的宫殿，按照DM的判断，你将出现在目的地里或其附近。

另外，如果你知道某个处于另一位面的传送法阵的印记序列，则该法术可以把你带到该法阵处。如果该传送法阵太小而装不下所有你输送的生物，则他们会出现在离传送法阵最近的未占空间中。

materials.value: 一根与一个存在位面调谐的价值 250+GP 的分叉金属棒

affects.special: 你和至多八名自愿的生物

Cone of Cold.name: 寒冰锥
Cone of Cold.description:
你释放出一团寒冷的空气。以你为源点的 60 尺锥状区域内的所有生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败受到 8d8 寒冷伤害，豁免成功则受到一半伤害。被该法术杀死的生物将成为一尊冰冻塑像直至其被解冻。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比五环高一环，法术伤害就增加 1d8。

Finger of Death.name: 死亡一指
Finger of Death.description:
你向施法距离内的一个可见生物释放负能量。该生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则受到 7d8 + 30 点暗蚀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

被该法术杀死的类人将在你下一回合开始时被唤起为一只受你操控的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmZombie00000000]，并在随后尽力遵循你的口头指令。

Power Word Kill.name: 律令死亡
Power Word Kill.description: 你强迫一名施法距离内你可见的生物死亡。若目标的生命值为 100 点或更少，则其立即死亡。否则，其受到 10d12 点心灵伤害。

Scrying.name: 探知术
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你改变自身以及随身的衣物、护甲、武器等在你身上的所有物。该效应在法术终止时结束。肉眼看来你的身高可以有 1 尺的增减，体态可胖可瘦。你必须选择一个和你肢体基础排列方式一致的形态。此外，幻术的影响范围由你决定。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会从帽子穿过去，且任何触碰帽子的人将摸不到任何东西。

如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: 一道看不见的力场制护盾浮现在你身旁，保护着你。在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]的伤害。

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description:
Legendary Action Uses: 3 (4 in Lair).

Immediately after another creature’s turn, Valindra can expend a use to take one of the following actions. Valindra regains all expended uses at the start of each of her turns.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If Valindra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

Counterspell.name: 法术反制
Counterspell.description: 你试图打断一名正在施法的生物。该生物进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败则法术消散且毫无效果，并且用于施展法术的动作、附赠动作或反应随之浪费。如果那道法术是使用法术位施展的，则法术位并不会被消耗。

activation.condition: 当你看见范围内一名生物施展一道法术时执行

All-Seeing.name: All-Seeing
All-Seeing.description: While in her lair, Valindra can cast [[/item .yVQN6kDuQz8IjPn0]]{Clairvoyance}, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as her Spellcasting action.

Clairvoyance.name: 鹰眼术
Clairvoyance.description:
你在施法距离内某处创造一个隐形的传感器，该处可以是你熟悉的地点（你曾到访过或看见过的地方），也可以是你不熟悉的显眼处（比如一扇门后，拐角位置或树林里）。这一无形体且不受伤害的传感器会在法术持续期间停留在该地。

施展该法术时，你可以选择进行观察或是聆听。你可以通过传感器以所选的感官方式感测，如同你处在传感器所在的空间。你能够以一个附赠动作在观察和聆听之间切换。

可以看见传感器的生物（例如一名生物受益于识破隐形或 &Reference[truesight] 时）会看到传感器是一个拳头大小的发光球体。

materials.value: 一件价值 100+GP 的法器：选择聆听则为一个以珠宝装饰的号角，选择观察则为一颗玻璃眼珠

Apathy.name: Apathy
Apathy.description: Creatures within 1 mile of the lair that aren’t Undead have Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws and Initiative rolls.

Disadv. Death Saves/Initiative.name: Disadv. Death Saves/Initiative
Disadv. Death Saves/Initiative.description: Creatures that aren’t Undead have Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws and Initiative rolls.

Thirst for Knowledge.name: Thirst for Knowledge
Thirst for Knowledge.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures have Advantage on Intelligence checks made when they take the Study action.

Adv. INT checks.name: Adv. INT checks
Adv. INT checks.description: Creatures have Advantage on Intelligence checks made when they take the Study action.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 豁免失败时，可以将其改为豁免成功。

Misty Escape.name: 雾隐遁行
Misty Escape.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can't return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 一旦返回你的休眠地，你变回吸血鬼形态并陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态直至你恢复任意生命值，你在此地停留 1 小时后恢复 1 生命值。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括沿着天花板移动，且不需要为此进行属性检定。

Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).name: 多重攻击（仅吸血鬼形态）
Multiattack (Vampire Form Only).description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]] 攻击并使用 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]。

Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only).name: 葬送打击（仅吸血鬼形态）
Grave Strike (Vampire Form Only).description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，其将被双手之一擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物不超过中型，则你被吸血鬼双手之一擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 14，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。

Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).name: 啃咬（仅蝙蝠或吸血鬼形态）
Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only).description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]] feet [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=ngPzlEI5pVSdBv86]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.aifVampireSpawn0]{Vampire Spawn} under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control.

affects.special: that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition

Charm.name: 魅惑
Charm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]), and the duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=fcRXSTOlFJShCl52]] hours. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target is a willing recipient of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]{Bite}, the damage of which doesn't end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Charm Person.name: 魅惑类人
Charm Person.description:
选择法术距离内你可见的一名类人生物，迫使该生物进行一次感知豁免，如果你或者你的同伴正在与其战斗，其进行的这次豁免将具有优势。如果其豁免失败，其陷入&Reference[charmed]状态直到法术结束，或者直到你或你的同伴对其造成伤害。被魅惑的生物将对你友好。在法术结束时，生物会知道其曾被你魅惑。

升环施法：使用的法术位每高一环，你就可以额外选择一个生物作为目标。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 目标陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态直到法术结束，或者直到施法者或施法者的同伴对它造成伤害。被魅惑的生物将对施法者友好。在法术结束时，生物会知道它曾被施法者魅惑。

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] isn't in sunlight or running water, it shape-shifts into a Tiny @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmBat00000000000]{bat} (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 30 ft.) or a Medium cloud of mist (Speed 5 ft., Fly Speed 20 ft. [hover]), or it returns to its vampire form. Anything it is wearing transforms with it.

While in bat form, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't speak. Its game statistics, other than its size and Speed, are unchanged.

While in mist form, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless and can enter an enemy's space and stop there. If air can pass through a space, the mist can do so, but it can't pass through liquid. It has Resistance to all damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

Beguile.name: 诱骗
Beguile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Deathless Strike.name: 不死者打击
Deathless Strike.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动等于其速度一半的距离，并发动一次 [[/item .mmGraveStrike000]] 攻击。

Vampire Weakness.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weakness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: 劣势：攻击和检定
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: 若你身处阳光下，你进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Vampire Nightbringer.name: 吸血夜魇
Vampire Nightbringer.description:
吸血鬼

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.y4ooBM6PNZfWH3Tv caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

吸血夜魇

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.6X4FKeIZkADH9rmW caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在阳光下开始其回合，其受到 [[/damage]]伤害。若其身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmShadowStrike00]] 攻击。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。目标的生命值上限减少等于其受到暗蚀伤害的数值，且[[lookup @name lowcase]]恢复等量生命值。

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处微光光照或黑暗，其执行 &Reference[Hide] 动作。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括沿着天花板移动，且不需要为此进行属性检定。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] 攻击并使用 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]]。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，其被双爪之一擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) 。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，则你被初生吸血鬼双爪之一擒抱，你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 13，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7mBlINHfcabm0DAr]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=7mBlINHfcabm0DAr]] feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Deathless Agility.name: 不死者机敏
Deathless Agility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[Dash] 或 &Reference[Disengage] 动作。

Vampire Weakness.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weakness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: 劣势：攻击和检定
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: 若你身处阳光下，你进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Vine Blight.name: 枯藤怪
Vine Blight.description:
枯萎怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.oIXTiU1B2cJqnVtP caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

枯藤怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.RZfbvPmt0H5c537e caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Constricting Vine.name: 藤蔓绞缠
Constricting Vine.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。 目标在其回合开始时受到[[/damage average activity=7voODpkc7vuuouqM]] 伤害，且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 无法再发动藤蔓绞缠攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你为大型或更小型生物, 则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态 (逃脱DC 12，[[/check skill=ath/acr format=long]]）。

Entangling Plants.name: 植物缠绕
Entangling Plants.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00] 使用体质作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @abilities.con.dc]]）。

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
缠绕的植物在施法距离内从 20 尺方状区域地面中破土而出。在法术持续时间内，这片被植物覆盖的区域变为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}。法术结束时，这些植物会消失。

在你施展法术时，该区域内的生物（除你之外）必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]{束缚}状态，直到法术终止。一名因此被束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定对抗该法术的豁免 DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 陷入束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定对抗该法术的豁免DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmRottingTouch00]] 攻击。

Violet Fungus Necrohulk.name: 紫腐菌尸聚怪
Violet Fungus Necrohulk.description:
真菌

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.pHlrbJcqGZYeFMhG caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

紫腐菌尸聚怪

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.QvL76BJNuAfB8EM1 caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/Item .mmRottingSlam000]] 攻击。

Spore Bomb.name: 蕈孢炸弹
Spore Bomb.description:
体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见一点为中心，半径[[lookup @target.template.size activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] 尺球状区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害，并且目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合开始。中毒期间，目标无法恢复生命值。

成功： 仅半伤。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直到紫腐菌尸聚怪的下一个回合开始。 中毒期间，你无法恢复生命值。

Absorb Body.name: 吞吃躯体
Absorb Body.description:
力量豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]]，单一 5 尺内体型不超过中型且[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的生物。

失败： 目标被拉入[[lookup @name lowercase]]所在的空间，并被嫁接到[[lookup @name lowercase]]身上。[[lookup @name lowercase]]同时能嫁接的生物数上限为一。

被嫁接期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态且其进行的体质豁免具有劣势。当[[lookup @name lowercase]]移动时，被嫁接目标也将一并移动。若目标在被嫁接期间死亡，其遗体将被摧毁，且[[lookup @name lowercase]]恢复[[lookup @healing.formula activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]]点生命值。被嫁接目标自身或位于[[lookup @name lowercase]] 5 尺内的生物，都能够以动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc format=long]]。检定成功则目标不再被嫁接，并移动至[[lookup @name lowercase]] 5 尺内的一处未占据空间。

heal.condition: 若目标在被嫁接期间死亡

Grafted: Con Saves and Restrained.name: 嫁接：体质豁免并束缚
Grafted: Con Saves and Restrained.description:
被嫁接期间，你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态且你进行的体质豁免具有劣势。

你自身或位于紫腐菌尸聚怪 5 尺内的生物，都能够以动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc format=long]]。检定成功则你不再被嫁接，并移动至紫腐菌尸聚怪 5 尺内的一处未占据空间。

Demonic Restoration.name: 恶魔复苏
Demonic Restoration.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]] 于无底深渊之外死去，其身躯会化为灰烬，并立即在无底深渊某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmShred000000000]] 攻击。

Spores.name: 孢子
Spores.description:
体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]]，源自[[lookup @name lowercase]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]] 尺光环区域内的所有生物。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，并在其回合结束重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。中毒期间，目标在其回合开始时受到[[/damage average activity=ukZveNVmvvtwbDj0]]伤害。向目标泼洒一瓶圣水将提前终止该效应。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，并在你的回合结束重复豁免，成功则终止自身上的该效应。

Stunning Screech.name: 震慑尖啸
Stunning Screech.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons succeed automatically).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Stunned apply=false]] 状态，直至鹫魔的下一个回合结束。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了 20+ 尺且目标生物体型不超过大型，则目标额外受到 5（2d4）钝击伤害，并陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若战马使用了移动攻击特性且你的生物体型不超过大型，你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Warrior Commander.name: 武将
Warrior Commander.description:
装备： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{巨剑}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepLongbow000]{长弓}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmPlateArmor]{Plate Armor}

武者

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.3Il3CvacAVpf6Rch caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

武将

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.8KIpoR728XfNWfEB caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Greatsword.name: 巨剑
Greatsword.description:
[[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 还将造成下列效应之一：

削弱。 直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始，目标的下次攻击检定具有劣势。

机动。 一名能看见或听见 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的盟友能以其 &Reference[Reaction apply=false] 移动至多等于其速度一半的距离且不会引发 &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]。

Disadvantage.name: 劣势
Disadvantage.description: 你的下一次攻击检定将具有劣势，直至武将的下一回合开始。

Longbow.name: 长弓
Longbow.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标的速度降低 10 尺直至其下个回合结束。

Speed: -10 ft..name: 速度降低 10 尺
Speed: -10 ft..description: 你的速度降低 10 尺直至武将下一回合结束。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes three attacks, using [[/item .cWEx0aUNtgAiphWk]] or [[/item .UYIXz9iBOnpRuR1H]] in any combination.

Tactical Charge.name: 战术突进
Tactical Charge.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 向一名其可见的敌人直线移动至多等于其速度一半的距离且不引发 &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]。

Counterattack.name: 反制攻击
Counterattack.description:
触发：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 被一次攻击检定命中。

响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 令其对抗该次攻击时的AC +4（可能令该次攻击失手）。若那次攻击失手，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以对攻击者发动一次 [[/item .cWEx0aUNtgAiphWk]] 或 [[/item .UYIXz9iBOnpRuR1H]] 攻击。

Foundry Note

该特性还提供了一个激活效应 (AE)，当你使用反应时，其会改变此生物的护甲等级。你可以在角色卡的“效应”选项卡中启用该效应。

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: 武者被一次攻击检定命中

+4 AC.name: +4 AC
+4 AC.description: 武将令其对抗那次攻击的AC +4，可能令那次攻击改为失手。

Maneuver.name: Maneuver
Maneuver.description: One [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=WMz2y2H5SLCDAxCF]] who can see or hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take a Reaction to move up to half the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=WMz2y2H5SLCDAxCF]]’s Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

Warrior Infantry.name: 新晋武者
Warrior Infantry.description:
Warriors

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.3Il3CvacAVpf6Rch caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Warrior Infantry

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.Tg6q9tEwUMz6alIf caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Warrior Veteran.name: 历战武者
Warrior Veteran.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepGreatsword]{Greatsword}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepHeavyCross]{Heavy Crossbow}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmSplintArmo]{Splint Armor}

Warriors

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.3Il3CvacAVpf6Rch caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .KkRkIIhD17sL5x30]] 或 [[/item .0nNkeR6HNC1e2uQ3]]攻击。

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Freeze.name: 冻结
Freeze.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到寒冷伤害，其速度降低 20 尺，直至其下一回合结束。

Speed: -20 ft..name: 速度降低 20 尺
Speed: -20 ft..description: 若你受到寒冷伤害，你的速度降低 20 尺，直至下一回合结束。

Water Form.name: 流水形态
Water Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]]攻击。

Slam.name: 猛击
Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

Whelm.name: 淹没
Whelm.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes [[/damage average activity=khxVwH3AB0sx1qRG]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]].

Success: Half damage only.

Grappled & Restrained.name: 擒抱并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: 若你的生物体型不超过大型，则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱 DC 14）。直至擒抱结束，你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，你 &Reference[suffocating]{窒息} 除非其能在水中呼吸，且你在 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的回合开始时受到额外伤害。

Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's speed in bear form. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

Werewyvern.name: Werewyvern
Werewyvern.description:
Changed by the Venom of the Wyvern

Among the rarest of were-creatures, werewyverns change from their humanoid forms into lean wyverns or into draconic-humanoid hybrids. Most werewyverns possess a draconic greed and ferocity and thus often find work as bandits, mercenaries, or assassins. They are opportunistic warriors and prefer ambushes when possible. Werewyverns like to keep their wyvern form a secret until they need an upper hand in a fight or an aerial escape.

Werewyverns transmit lycanthropy through their potent venom. The curse’s transmission is unpredictable and often as much a surprise to the werewyvern as it is to the victim.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The werewyvern makes three attacks, using [[/item Javelin]] or [[/item Rend]] in any combination. It can replace one of these attacks with one [[/item .qOcbsULcrJpjT93o]]{Stinger} attack.

Stinger (Wyvern or Hybrid Form Only).name: Stinger (Wyvern or Hybrid Form Only)
Stinger (Wyvern or Hybrid Form Only).description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the werewyvern’s next turn.

If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Qb3qLkA4CYd8yiYp]].

Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a Werewyvern under the DM’s control and has 20 Hit Points.

Success: The target is immune to this werewyvern’s curse for 24 hours.

Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至海盗将军的下一回合开始。

Whaleboat.description:
Whaleboats are light, specialized craft deployed when Norlander longship crews spot their quarry. They carry six rowers and a single harpooner armed with spears.

Cost: 500 GP

Life Drain.

A Humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.aifZombie0000000]{Zombie} under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control, unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at a time.

Invisible.description: 你及你的光照获得 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态直至专注终止，该效应会在发动攻击或使用附赠动作后立即结束。

Chilling Gaze.description:

成功：目标在 1 小时内免疫所有[[lookup @name lowercase]]（除巨恶雪怪外）的寒颤凝视。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态（除非目标对寒冷伤害免疫），直至雪怪的下一回合开始。

Demonic Restoration.name: 恶魔复苏
Demonic Restoration.description: 若[[lookup @name lowercase]] 于无底深渊之外死去，其身躯会化为灰烬，并立即在无底深渊某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括沿着天花板移动，且不需要为此进行属性检定。

Web Walker.name: 蛛网行者
Web Walker.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在蛛网上移动时无视蛛网造成的移动限制。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmCausticLash000]] 攻击，并使用施法施展 [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.Jb90KYAoPhjG8vHS]] 或 [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.89GTF8QDLUchiqCY]]（若条件允许）。

Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展以下一道法术，无需材料成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGaseousFor] (self only)，@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]

1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominatePe]

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]变形为中型类人或中型蜘蛛，或变回其真实形态。其各形态下游戏数据均相同，且其着装或携带的任何装备都不会随之变化。

Toxic Escape.name: 毒性逃脱
Toxic Escape.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 被一次攻击检定命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 令此次攻击对其造成的伤害减半（向下取整），并传送至 [[lookup @range.value activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]] 尺内一处其可见的未占据空间。

体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]], [[lookup @name lowercase]] 目标空间 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=f6zHSW2bzTmUO9oR]] 尺内的所有生物。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束。中毒期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: 蜡融妖被一次攻击检定命中。

range.special: 传送至可见的未占据空间

Poisoned and Incapacitated.name: 中毒并失能
Poisoned and Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至你下一回合结束。中毒期间，你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description:
在法术持续时间内，你将触碰到的一名自愿生物连同其穿着携带物一起转化为一团云雾。如果目标的生命值降至 0 或其用一个魔法动作终止其身上的法术效应，则那个目标身上的法术终止。

在该形态下，目标唯一的移动方式即是 10 尺的飞行速度，且可以悬浮。该目标可以进入并占据一个已有生物占据的空间。其拥有钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性，其对 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态免疫，且进行力量、敏捷和体质豁免时具有优势。该目标可以穿过狭隙，但会将液态物质视为固体表面。

云雾形态的目标不能讲话或操作物件，其随身携带或持握的物件不会掉落，也不能被使用或与之互动。另外，目标也不能攻击或施法。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Gaseous Form.name: 气化形体
Gaseous Form.description: 在该形态下，你唯一的移动方式即是 10 尺的飞行速度，且可以悬浮。你可以进入并占据一个已有生物占据的空间。其拥有钝击、穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性，其对 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态免疫，且进行力量、敏捷和体质豁免时具有优势。你可以穿过狭隙，但会将液态物质视为固体表面。

Web.name: 蛛网
Web.description:
你在法术范围内指定一点召唤出一大片黏黏的网状物。蛛网覆盖以该点为源点的 20 尺立方区域，并在法术持续时间内维持存在。蛛网范围内视为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}，并造成 &Reference[lightlyobscured]{轻度遮蔽}。

如果蛛网没有被固定在两个固体中间（例如墙和树）或跨在一片地板、墙壁、天花板中间，则蛛网会自动坍塌，而导致法术在你的下一回合开始时终止。摊在平面上的蛛网深度为 5 尺。

在一个回合中首次进入蛛网，或任何在蛛网中开始其回合的生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]状态，直至其离开蛛网或挣脱束缚。

一名因蛛网陷入束缚状态的生物可以用一个动作进行一次对抗你的法术豁免 DC 的力量（[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]{运动}）检定。如果成功，则其不再被束缚。

蛛网是可燃的。任何 5 尺立方区域的蛛网在遇到火焰后会在一轮内燃烧殆尽，并对火焰中开始其回合的生物造成[[/damage 2d4 type=fire]]伤害。

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的类人必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

该目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，六环至多 10 分钟，七环至多 1 小时，八环及以上至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: 陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] ，当你受到伤害时，重复 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功时结束自身身上的法术效应。

Young Deep Dragon.name: Young Deep Dragon
Young Deep Dragon.description:
Dragons of Caverns and Secrets

Deep dragons slither through the wet and lightless places of the Underdark. They are stealthy hunters with an affinity for lost lore and fungi that flourish in the depths. As deep dragons age, their smooth, serpentine bodies become riddled with fungal rot, particularly around their faces, to imbue their breath with terror-inducing spores.

Deep dragons covet treasure and knowledge. Some deep dragons seek to gain knowledge via experience and travel, slithering through caverns and seas of the Underdark to map hidden passages for dozens of miles. Other deep dragons enjoy cultivating groves of molds and fungi, including colossal varieties sufficient to conceal the dragons’ sinuous forms. Many deep dragons collect forgotten tomes or works of art and bully, cajole, or steal collections from drow or duergar sages.

Deep dragons are excellent swimmers. They often clash with aquatic Underdark societies, such as kuo-toa. Many deep dragons demand tribute from these groups in the form of food or treasure.

Underdark explorers have many reasons to brave deep dragon lairs beyond treasure hunting; they might contain the only surviving copies of forgotten lore, fungal ingredients for cures or plagues, or maps to lost Underdark locales.

Young Deep Dragon

Young deep dragons establish lairs in familiar hunting grounds and defend their lairs with twisting passages and traps such as deadfalls. They dominate the local environment, consuming vast quantities of fish and pale crabs and cultivating fungal growths. They bully nearby communities when they can or enter into cautious arrangements with powerful Underdark settlements, such as drow cities.

Young Spirit Dragon.name: Young Spirit Dragon
Young Spirit Dragon.description:
Draconic Scions of an Ancient Empire

Spirit dragons, sometimes called song dragons, are powerful dragons whose powers stem from the magic and history of fallen realms. They embody the spirit of a bygone age, and so as they grow and mature, they develop an erratic control over time.

A spirit dragon’s primary motivation is to unearth and study the ruins of the ancient realm from which it arose. Spirit dragons share an innate intellectual curiosity, and many have a deep appreciation for the culture and art of humanoid societies.

Spirit dragons find even the most commonplace melodies moving. A song written in the time and region from which a spirit dragon hails can potentially overwhelm the dragon, driving it to either morose despondence or passionate rage.

No two spirit dragons are exactly alike; each individual bears features distinct to the empire from which it hails. Roll on or choose a result from the Spirit Dragon Origins table to determine which lost realm a spirit dragon is from.

@embed[Compendium.dnd-adventures-faerun.tables.RollTable.aifSpiritDragonO rollable resultLabel="The Spirit Dragon Traces Its Origins To …"]

Young Spirit Dragon

Curious and self-confident, young spirit dragons can cause trouble for a region’s other denizens, by either unleashing long-buried evils or misusing scarcely understood ancient magic.

Ruinous Breath.description:

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Time-Warping Breath.name: Time-Warping Breath
Time-Warping Breath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=2qOGwQgxNS9ergzZ]], each creature that isn’t currently affected by this breath in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=2qOGwQgxNS9ergzZ]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=2qOGwQgxNS9ergzZ]].

Failure: The target’s Speed is halved, it can’t take Reactions, and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Speed Halved.name: Speed Halved
Speed Halved.description: The target’s Speed is halved, it can’t take Reactions, and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]变形为大型的蛇，或变回其真实形态。若其死亡，则其保持在当前的形态不变。除注明部分外，其各形态下游戏数据均相同。[[lookup @name lowercase]]着装或携带的任何装备都不会随之变化。

Animal Friendship.name: 化兽为友
Animal Friendship.description:
在施法距离内指定一只你能看见的野兽。该野兽必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。如果你或你的盟友对目标造成伤害，法术将提前终止。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以多选择一个野兽作为目标。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 你在法术持续时间内被施加者&Reference[charmed apply=false]。如果施加者或施加者的盟友对你造成伤害，则法术终止。

Suggestion.name: 暗示术
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不明显涉及伤害目标及其盟友的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内或直到你或你的盟友对其造成伤害前陷入魅惑。被魅惑的目标会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: 遵循暗示
Pursuing Suggestion.description: 被魅惑的你会尽其所能地执行施法者所描述的行为。施法者所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果施法者所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在你完成了施法者的要求后随即终止。
